flawed_nl_solution:
The dinner cost 10+2.5=$<<10+2.5=12.5>>12.5.
The tip comes to 12.5*0.2=$2.5.
So the total cost is 12.5+2.5=$<<12.5+2.5=19>>19.
That means she gets 20-19=$<<20-19=1>>1 in change.
